featured.text: Shouting greetings and waving a big sign, Tony _____
Tony: May I have some more coffee, please?

definition.zh_def: 一個男性名字，通常用作安東尼（Anthony）的暱稱。
definition.en_def: A male given name, often a diminutive of Anthony.
definition.example: Tony is my best friend and we hang out every weekend.
